Description:
Equipped with a 23.8" Full-HD (1920x1080) IPS Panel with a 170hz Refresh rate & 1ms (MPRT) response time, the G2422 provides a competitive edge over most opponents. 
Built with AMD FreeSync Premium technology, the G2422 can synchronize display & GPU refresh rates for ultra-smooth gameplay. Built-in MSI Esports Gaming technologies can be activated for additional in-game advantages (e.g. Night Vision smart black tuner).
Review: Coming from a 75hz monitor, this was a welcome change. After a day of usage, I can confidently say this is the best deal available for a 144hz IPS in the market right now. I haven't dove deep down in calibration yet, but the oob colour experience is fantastic. No dead pixels either, and minimal glow (at least with my unit).Working with HDMI right now, so haven't been able to check GSync yet. But 144hz is working fine. All in all, extremely happy with the purchase...and I'm someone who's pro...

Product Name: Consistent DDR3 DDR3 4 GB (Single Channel) PC (Desktop 4GB DDR3)
Description: Consistent RAM is the abbreviation for "double data rate fourth generation synchronous dynamic random-access memory", the latest variant of memory in computing. DDR3 is able to achieve higher speed and efficiency thanks to increased transfer rates and decreased voltage. The last dynamic random-access memory update, DDR3, came out in 2007, but developers began working on DDR3 back in 2005.
